item.title: Name di-confusion
item.description: This is my first post and instead of a proper introduction, I would like to clarify my name’s situation. I intend do that bacause many non-Greek friends and colleagues get confused since my name is different on official documents than how I normally write it. The situation Formal and informal My ID name is Ιωάννης which directly translates to English as Ioannis. However, in common Greek “Ioannis” this name in Greek sounds too formal and thus its diminutive form, Γιάννης, is preferred.
